abstract: Current and former employees said the mood at Apple headquarters after Steve Jobs's death was a combination of sadness and business as usual.
snippet: Current and former employees said the mood at Apple headquarters after Steve Jobs's death was a combination of sadness and business as usual.
lead_paragraph: While the world publicly mourned the death of Steve Jobs on Thursday, Apple employees did so more quietly, as befits a company that prizes secrecy. Some employees said the mood at the company's headquarters in Cupertino, Calif., was a combination of sadness and business as usual.

headline.main: On Apple's Campus, Shock and Sadness
